text: Soni chisimu chene pamasile patwampele Luqman lunda lwakusokoka (ni twansalile kuti): “Muntogolelani Allah.” Sano jwaakutogolela, nikuti akutogolela kwakulikamuchisya nsyene, nambo jwakanile, basi (akanile kwakulijonanga nsyene), chisimu Allah ni Jwakupata kwejinji (jwangalajila chilichose), Jwakulapilidwa kusyesyene
